content: The Wandering Wight boss isn't a secret, but the **Wandering Wight Spirit is missable** and that's not made clear. You'll need to pass the Wandering Wight to get out of the Forest of Wolves and onto the next part of Chapter 1 - Black Cloud, Red Fire, but it can be tempting to leave the challenging fight until the end and return to it later. Whatever you do, **beat him before you unlock the secret area in Chapter 1 that requires ringing the bells.**

The content is as follows:
The Wandering Wight boss isn't a secret, but the **Wandering Wight Spirit is missable** and that's not made clear. You'll need to pass the Wandering Wight to get out of the Forest of Wolves and onto the next part of Chapter 1 - Black Cloud, Red Fire, but it can be tempting to leave the challenging fight until the end and return to it later. Whatever you do, **beat him before you unlock the secret area in Chapter 1 that requires ringing the bells.**
